entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
